articles.author: Julie Steenhuysen
articles.title: Alzheimer's diagnosis revamp embraces rating scale similar to cancer - Reuters
articles.description: Alzheimer's disease experts are revamping the way doctors diagnose patients with the progressive brain disorder - the most common type of dementia - by devising a seven-point rating scale based on cognitive and biological changes in the patient.
